description: Dispatched when a circuit breaker opens due to consecutive failures, preventing further requests until reset.

service.description: Name of the service where the circuit breaker was opened

consecutiveFailures.description: Number of consecutive failures that caused the circuit breaker to open

resetTimeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds after which the circuit breaker will attempt to reset

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the circuit breaker was opened
